languages.text: When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.

traits.locale_text: When suffering damage, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.

When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.

When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.

languages.text: 当受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此生物会启动自毁程序，在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时爆炸。若此生物在自毁过程中死亡，也同样会引发爆炸。
languages.original_text: When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.

traits.locale_text: 当受到伤害时，此生物会启动自毁程序，在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时爆炸。若此生物在自毁过程中死亡，也同样会引发爆炸。

languages.text: Получив {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, существо активирует протокол самоуничтожения и взрывается в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Если убить существо раньше, чем процесс самоуничтожения завершится, также произойдет взрыв.
languages.original_text: When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.

traits.locale_text: Получив урон, существо активирует протокол самоуничтожения и взрывается в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Если убить существо раньше, чем процесс самоуничтожения завершится, также произойдет взрыв.

Получив урон, существо активирует протокол самоуничтожения и взрывается в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Если убить существо раньше, чем процесс самоуничтожения завершится, также произойдет взрыв.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた時、この生物は自爆プロトコルを発動し、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に爆発する。自爆処理中の生物を殺すとそれも爆発を起こす。
languages.original_text: When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.

traits.locale_text: ダメージを受けた時、この生物は自爆プロトコルを発動し、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に爆発する。自爆処理中の生物を殺しても爆発を起こす。

languages.text: Al sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, esta criatura activa un protocolo de autodestrucción y explota en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Matar a una criatura que se está autodestruyendo también causará una explosión.
languages.original_text: When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.

traits.locale_text: Al sufrir daño, esta criatura activa un protocolo de autodestrucción y explota en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Matar a una criatura que se está autodestruyendo también causará una explosión.

languages.text: Erleidet diese Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aktiviert sie ein Selbstzerstörungsprotokoll und explodiert bei ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Das Töten einer Kreatur im Selbstzerstörungsmodus verursacht ebenfalls eine Explosion.
languages.original_text: When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.

traits.locale_text: Beim Erleiden von Schaden aktiviert diese Kreatur ein Selbstzerstörungsprotokoll und explodiert bei ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Das Töten einer Kreatur im Selbstzerstörungsmodus verursacht ebenfalls eine Explosion.

languages.text: Lorsqu'elle subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, cette créature active son protocole d'autodestruction et explose lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. L'élimination d'une créature en cours d'autodestruction provoque également une explosion.
languages.original_text: When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'elle subit des dégâts, cette créature active son protocole d'autodestruction et explose lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. L'élimination d'une créature en cours d'autodestruction provoque également une explosion.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kaldığında kendini imha protokolünü etkinleştirir ve bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} patlar. Kendini imha sürecindeki bir yaratığı öldürmek de patlamaya sebep olur.
languages.original_text: When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct protocol, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.
